examples.example: 每天乘坐地铁去上班，让我感受到城市交通的便捷与高效。

translate.english: Taking the subway to work every day makes me feel the convenience and efficiency of urban transportation.

examples.example: 地铁的开通为人们的出行带来了极大的便利，让城市生活更加美好。

translate.english: The opening of the subway has brought great convenience to people's travel and made urban life more beautiful.

examples.example: 我喜欢乘坐地铁去探索城市的各个角落，感受不同地方的独特魅力。

translate.english: I like to take the subway to explore every corner of the city and feel the unique charm of different places.
